::: {style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 48px; margin: 48px 0; align-items: start;"}

### What the Data Reveals

Research across thousands of construction tenders exposes a critical truth: most contractors are losing before evaluation even begins.

**The numbers are stark:**

<div style="margin: 24px 0; padding: 24px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa 0%, #e9ecef 100%); border-radius: 8px;">
<p style="color: var(--bim-charcoal); margin: 12px 0; font-size: 16px;"><strong style="font-size: 24px; color: var(--bim-orange);">40-60%</strong> of tenders eliminated at compliance stage</p>
<p style="color: var(--bim-charcoal); margin: 12px 0; font-size: 16px;"><strong style="font-size: 24px; color: var(--bim-orange);">30-40%</strong> error rates using outdated cost data</p>
<p style="color: var(--bim-charcoal); margin: 12px 0; font-size: 16px;"><strong style="font-size: 24px; color: var(--bim-orange);">25%</strong> more investment in preparation by winners</p>
<p style="color: var(--bim-charcoal); margin: 12px 0; font-size: 16px;"><strong style="font-size: 24px; color: var(--bim-orange);">Only 1/3</strong> of projects provide BIM at tender stage</p>
</div>
:::

::: {style=""}
### The 70% Price Myth

Many contractors believe price dominates tender evaluation. The evidence tells a different story.

::: {.callout-box style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff5f5 0%, #ffe8e8 100%); border-left: 4px solid var(--bim-orange);"}
#### Reality Check

Modern procurement frameworks allocate **40-60% to non-price criteria** including methodology, experience, risk management, and sustainability. Technical excellence regularly beats lower prices.

UK Best Practice uses **60% quality, 40% price** for construction. Norwegian frameworks dedicate **40%** to methodology and risk alone.
:::

**This means:** Contractors who compete only on price are fighting with one hand tied behind their back.
:::

:::

:::
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: What win rate improvement can I realistically expect?**
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: Do you work with smaller contractors and SMEs?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}

:::
:::

::: {.faq-question}
